resources.string: Enter the first day of your last normal menstrual period

SARAH HAS BEEN CHARTING HER MENSTRUAL CYCLE FOR THE LAST SIX MONTHS AND THESE ARE THE NUMBER OF DAYS FROM THE FIRST DAY OF BLEEDING OF ONE MONTH TO THE FIRST DAY OF BLEEDING OF THE NEXT MONTH:29, 30, 28, 29, 31, 29, 30.

 Shortest Period is 28 days. The earliest day of her fertile period is 28-18 = 10
 The longest period is 31 days. The latest day of her fertile period is 31-11 = 20

 This implies that from day 10 to day 20 of her period is a fertile period and sex should be avoided to prevent pregnancy.
 In a practical sense, if Sarah began her menses 5th of October; 10 days from which will be 15th October. 20 days from which will be 25th of October.

Before you go for a vasectomy
For more accurate results, you should have data for your last 6 cycles from which you will then choose the shortest cycle and the longest cycle

The figures and numbers given here are estimates, and do not replace your doctor’s prescription or recommendations. Your doctor should be consulted on any health concerns and do not rely entirely on this Internet resource

TIMELINESS:
 We commit to deliver our all and our best when it is needed, knowing that delay may be the line between illness and wellness.
 INTEGRITY:
 We are honest, truthful and reliable. Committing to what we shall surely achieve dispensing with all else.
 INNOVATIVENESS:
 We seek the obvious and more. We create uniqueness in commonplace and generate that difference out of the normal.
 QUALITY:
 We stop at nothing less than the best. Every one deserves the best and we decide to spare no skill, talent, knowledge or resource to provide that.
